Articles.Content:
Basically how it works is the above person asks a "would you rather" question, and the next poster answers, and then they ask a question. Meanwhile there will be a poll question too. I will do this weekly (a new one each month, this way I will be able to start a new poll) I will only do it weekly if this gets popular and if it's ok with the mods

RULES:

don't use the poll question, and don't repeat, have fun

I shall start;

would you rather get in a Kerbal rocket with way too many boosters or a rocket with few struts

Rocket with too many boosters (should we put a reason for our response?)

Would you rather go to Mars or Kerbin? (as in you, in real life, go to Kerbin)

KERBIN!!!!! KERBALSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!! KATS!!!!

would you rather cut boosters or cut the cutes to fit your budget.

Boosters...you can actually do more with fewer boosters than with more (...irony...)

Would you rather have your ship be stranded near Duna or Eve? (it's a manned ship with limited supplies)

Duna, atleast a rescue ship can pick me up

would you rather be forced to watch a 1-hour loop of an orangutan peeing it its own moth, or a hippo with explosive diarrhea (these are actual videos)
Considering Jeb is an ACTUAL pilot...

Considering Jeb is an ACTUAL pilot...

Your suposed to answer the person above.

@MrWalrus

An Orangutang peeing in it's own mouth, don't know why just seems less disgusting.

Would you rather

Be a Kerbal or Be a Human?

( Well EXCUSE me, I mean come on! If there's a poll, why is it a game?)

Human. Taller...

Would you rather be in the Roman Empire or the German Empire?

Roman Empire, I'm fascinated by the romans

Would you rather

Stay on the ISS for a year with 5 other astronauts or stay on Mars for 5 years with one other astronaut.

ISS, if something goes wrong, you have faster way of getting home safely.

Would you rather, find yourself trapped in orbit around Jupiter or get sucked into a black hole?

Black hole. I'd die quicker.

Would you rather fall out of your ship too close to Earth? Or open your helmet in space?

Fall out close to earth. So I can be rescued.

Would you rather

Live on Mercury or live on Pluto

Pluto of course. The Sun's too bright on Mercury.

Wood you rather...

Have a live bear in your living room, OR to have a live crocodile in your bathtub?

Crocodile. I can shoot it easier. XD

Would you rather inhale toxic gas, or watch a JB video 300 times?

The JB video....

Would you rather live forever (Just you) or Die now.

Live for ever.

would you rather

work for nasa or work for space X

For Space X, because they use KSP for testing software.

Would you rather stop playing KSP or die to play it in heaven?

Stop playing KSP. Don't beleive in heaven

Would you rather

Go splat as you crash on Tylo or be a lone colonists on Eve

Be kolonist.

Would you rather be Jeb and not be able to control yourself orÃ¢â‚¬â€¹ be yourself and not be able to control Jeb?

Myself...

Would you rather live on a terraformed exoplanet, or a terraformed Mars?

A terraformed exoplanet.

Would you rather burn to death or drown?

Drown less painful.

Would you rather live in a binary star system or a primary star system

primary, solar radiation is dangerous.

Would you rather find undeniable proof(a live specimen in a trap) of the existence Sasquatch, or receive a nobel prize?

sasquatch. then I can kill it.

would you rather join the marines or army?

I'm an idiot I meant trinary star system.

I don't know how to answer this question as I can't join either but probably army as a sniper.

Would you rather

be stuck in space for 5 years or be stuck on Europa for 1 year
